thread.title: Glitch Plagues Prepaid Debit Cards Backed by Russell Simmons
thread.title_full: Glitch Plagues Prepaid Debit Cards Backed by Russell Simmons - NBC News

author: Associated Press
title: Glitch Plagues Prepaid Debit Cards Backed by Russell Simmons
text:
NEW YORK -- Thousands of customers of prepaid debit cards backed by hip-hop mogul Russell Simmons remain without access to their money more than a week after technical problems first began plaguing the cards.
Customers of the so-called RushCards, mostly people without bank accounts, said they have missed car payments. Worse, some said they have been unable to purchase food or important items for their families.
Russell Simmons attends the "Change Begins Within" Benefit at Los Angeles Times Central Court on Dec. 3, 2011, in Los Angeles. Jason Merritt / Getty Images The problems with the RushCard started Oct.12, when a software upgrade in the transaction processing system caused many RushCard accounts to show a zero balance or caused customers to have no access to their funds.
The company says the glitch has been mostly resolved, though thousands remain affected.
